translations: adj.复原的；恢复的；有恢复力的

phrs.translation: 有恢复力的, 有回复力的, 复原的
换热炉, 回热式电炉
回热式热交换器, 复热式热交换器, 间壁式换热器, 同流热交换器
回热式燃汽轮机, 间壁回热式燃气轮机

sentences.sentence: Human beings have great recuperative powers.
sentences.translation: 人类拥有极强的恢复能力。

sentences.sentence: Health. You take good care of yourself and have great recuperative.
sentences.translation: 你可以很好的照顾自己，并有很强的恢复能力。

sentences.sentence: Millions come to India every year to get treated and then enjoy their recuperative holidays across India.
sentences.translation: 数以百万计来印度每年获得的待遇，并享受其疗养假期印度各地。
